data.name: Monster Stalker: Prologue Demo
data.detailed_description: Monster Stalker: Prologue Demo combines card battle and RPG. You will build deck, fight various monsters and get skill points, upgrade skill tree and get new cards. In the last battle of the Demo, a new teammate with different card color and play strategy will join you. Wish you enjoy fighting monsters and getting stronger!
data.about_the_game: Monster Stalker: Prologue Demo combines card battle and RPG. You will build deck, fight various monsters and get skill points, upgrade skill tree and get new cards. In the last battle of the Demo, a new teammate with different card color and play strategy will join you. Wish you enjoy fighting monsters and getting stronger!
data.short_description: Monster Stalker: Prologue Demo tells the early stage story of Monster Stalker. It combines card battle and RPG. Aliens invade earth and monsters are coming. You will build deck, fight various monsters and get teammates. Go fight and save earth!
